constant_class.Name: Constants
constant_class.Comment: /** Indentifiers for the Suite Storage subsystem */

constant.Name: SETTINGS_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Extension of the file to save suites settings.

constant.Name: INSTALL_INFO_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Extension of the file to save the suite installation information.

constant.Name: PROPS_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Extension of the file to save the suite application properties.

constant.Name: SECURE_EXTENSION
constant.Comment: Extension of the file to save the suite secure resources.

constant.Name: TRANSACTION_DATA_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Name of the file containing information about the current transaction.

constant.Name: SUITE_DATA_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Name of the file with the basic information about the installed suites.

constant.Name: ICON_CACHE_FILENAME
constant.Comment: Name of the file with the cached icons.

constant.Name: INSTALL_NOTIFY_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the install notify URL.

constant.Name: DELETE_NOTIFY_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the delete notify URL.

constant.Name: SUITE_NAME_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the suite name.

constant.Name: SUITE_VENDOR_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the suite vendor.

constant.Name: SUITE_VERSION_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the suite version.

constant.Name: SUITE_DESC_PROP
constant.Comment: MIDlet property for the suite description.
